text: The third generation iPad (sold as The new iPad, sometimes called the iPad 3) is a tablet computer that is made and sold by Apple Inc. It added new features, such as a Retina display, a new Apple A5X processor, a 5 megapixel camera, 1080p video recording, and support for LTE networks in North America. ==References== Category:IPad Category:Tablets released in 2012 Category:Apple products released in 2012
title: IPad (3rd generation)
